title: Bars, Baltimore, 2006
name: Bars, Baltimore, 2006
description: If you find yourself in the Charm City, and are craving a drink stop into one of these bars in Baltimore. There are bars in hit downtown locations like Canton, Federal Hill, and the Inner Harbor. Just please remember to drink responsibly, never drink and drive, and just say NO to drugs. Insert public safety announcement here:_____________. This data was collected from Metromix at: http://baltimore.metromix.com/eventsAccess Date: November 27, 2007
